title: Scalping Set (Ultra‑Short TF)
purpose: Micro pullback entries with VWAP/EMA alignment and RSI confirmation.
rationale: Favor quick pullbacks to VWAP/EMA with RSI re‑cross and adequate volume.

reading_guide.signal_logic: price near vwap or ema9 AND rsi7 recross AND vol_z not depressed

beginner_summary: Ultra-short entries near VWAP/EMA with quick RSI recross and volume support.
assistant_hints: Trade only during liquid hours; avoid midday lulls.
Favor pullbacks to VWAP/EMA with fast rejection.
RSI re‑cross works better than fixed thresholds here.
Keep stops tight; accept many small losses over few big ones.
